channel.title: (Somewhat) similar and/or related to OGM (initiatives, approaches, movements, etc.)
channel.description:
## Game ~B / GameB / Game B (2018 - ) - [Game B Wiki](https://www.gameb.wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page) - [Game B on Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/gameb/) - [Game ~B Discord](https://discord.com/invite/Gm9nEZJ) - [On Game~B](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VqIGuIafjW9WSVeBJf7jWFfuOXBiUZLWk2pqJOhNESc/edit) created by [James Allen](https://twitter.com/SeamusOhAilin) - [ The Game~B Library](https://www.gameblibrary.com/) by [Nick Redmark](https://twitter.com/nickredmark) - [Game B Tech Sensemaking Doc](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GGBABc5jiFNWOglYTZu9T4NV4rCOoYoSvkg-AfW84vs/edit) by [Nick Redmark](https://twitter.com/nickredmark)
---
## Sensemaking Web (2019 -) * [THE SENSEMAKING WEB BRAINDUMP](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FmwYnsyzNUITy_ySyOKy3bgnNZsq2uIGoqn6azJa7qI/edit) curated by [Gwendolyn Huot](https://twitter.com/gwendolynhuot)
---
## Noosphere (2020 -) - [Noosphere Map - Miro Board](https://miro.com/app/board/o9J_kniyxiY=/) by [Johan Brändstedt](https://www.linkedin.com/in/johan-cedmar-brandstedt-a77b311/) - clicking on the note icon (top-right) will give an intro on what this is all about - #wiki [Noosphere](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noosphere) as coined by [Pierre de Chardin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Teilhard_de_Chardin) & [Vladimir Vernadsky](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vladimir_Vernadsky) ≈ sphere of human consciousness, sphere of reason
---
## Linkybrains / Linky Brains (2018 - inactive) - [Linkybrains website](https://linkybrains.com/) => [How it Started](https://linkybrains.com/how-it-started/) - [My Linky Brain. Why Did Nobody Tell Me?](https://medium.com/@alexdunsdon/my-linky-brain-why-did-nobody-tell-me-b085527887bf) by [Alex Dunsdon]() - [Quora: What are the indicators of a linky brain?](https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-indicators-of-a-linky-brain) by [Chris Tottman](https://twitter.com/christottman1)
---
## School of The Possible (2018 - ?) Initiated by [Dave Gray](https://twitter.com/davegray) - #website [SCHOOL OF THE POSSIBLE](http://schoolofthepossible.com/) - #blog [ School of the Possible on Medium](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible) - [Introducing the School of the Possible](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/introducing-the-school-of-the-possible-47756b154f8f) > **Episode one:** Our new digital ecosystems need new kinds of learning institutions. - [Help us create educational infrastructure for the 21st century.](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/help-us-create-educational-infrastructure-for-the-21st-century-d7747efab580) > **Episode two:** Why now is the moment to do this. - [Why are we starting the School of the Possible?](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/why-are-we-starting-the-school-of-the-possible-8789f43fa5bd) > **Episode three:** Do we really need another innovation training program? - [Where I am coming from](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/where-i-am-coming-from-120fff11a630) > **Episode four:** Why should we listen to you Dave? - [What you can do today to heal this broken world.](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/what-you-can-do-today-to-heal-this-broken-world-3c54124ffa99) > **Episode five:** A key to unlock the next level of human consciousness. - [An invitation to try a recipe which is an experiment for healing the world.](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/an-invitation-to-try-a-recipe-which-is-an-experiment-for-healing-the-world-a6bb0602bc8a) - [How to start a lab page](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/lab-page-attractor-c39cd58262a6) - [Lab page attractor.](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/lab-page-attractor-c39cd58262a6) ### [School of the Possible purpose.](https://medium.com/school-of-the-possible/why-are-we-starting-the-school-of-the-possible-8789f43fa5bd#d5be:~:text=School%20of%20the%20Possible%20purpose) > Our goal is to give everyone on the planet the choice to participate in building the platform that will support and enable their future instead of sitting on the sidelines. To create the future we want instead of just drifting along and seeing what happens.

item.title: (Somewhat) similar and/or related to OGM (initiatives, approaches, movements, etc.)
item.dc:creator: anderbill
item.description:
Launch of “The Atlas of the Human Planet 2020"

From: EHRLICH Daniele Daniele.EHRLICH@ec.europa.eu
Subject: Launch of “The Atlas of the Human Planet 2020 – Open Geoinformation for Research, Policy, and Action" January 21, 2021, 3pm
Date: 14 January 2021 at 14:18:21 CET
To: EHRLICH Daniele Daniele.EHRLICH@ec.europa.eu

The Human Planet Initiative is proud to announce the launch of the Atlas of the Human Planet 2020. This edition collects 100 case studies that use Global Human Settlement Layer data sets in thematic areas of Disaster Risk Management, Urbanisation, Development, Environment and Sustainability.

The virtual launch event takes place on January 21, 2021, 3pm and it will feature presentations delivered by authors of the showcases.

Find out more at https://ghsl.jrc.ec.europa.eu/news.php

Read full topic
item.source: (Somewhat) similar and/or related to OGM (initiatives, approaches, movements, etc.)

item.title: (Somewhat) similar and/or related to OGM (initiatives, approaches, movements, etc.)
item.dc:creator: holtzermann17
item.description:
Hi @tovissy

I start a Miro board (still not fleshed out) that tries to focus on the relationships between OGM and other orgs. https://miro.com/app/board/o9J_leYr4yI=/

The Organizational infrastructures and affiliations Rolodex page could also be another resource for finding cross-linking people (but folks haven’t yet been updating that).

Read full topic

item.description:
Game ~B / GameB / Game B (2018 - )

  • Game B Wiki

  • Game ~B Discord

  • Game B Tech Sensemaking Doc by Nick Redmark

Sensemaking Web (2019 -)

Noosphere (2020 -)

  • Noosphere Map - Miro Board by Johan Brändstedt - clicking on the note icon (top-right) will give an intro on what this is all about
  • #wiki Noosphere as coined by Pierre de Chardin & Vladimir Vernadsky ≈ sphere of human consciousness, sphere of reason

Linkybrains / Linky Brains (2018 - inactive)

  • Linkybrains website => How it Started
  • My Linky Brain. Why Did Nobody Tell Me? by Alex Dunsdon
  • Quora: What are the indicators of a linky brain? by Chris Tottman

School of The Possible (2018 - ?)

Initiated by Dave Gray

  • #website SCHOOL OF THE POSSIBLE
  • #blog School of the Possible on Medium
    • Introducing the School of the Possible > Episode one: Our new digital ecosystems need new kinds of learning institutions.
    • Help us create educational infrastructure for the 21st century. > Episode two: Why now is the moment to do this.
    • Why are we starting the School of the Possible? > Episode three: Do we really need another innovation training program?
    • Where I am coming from > Episode four: Why should we listen to you Dave?
    • What you can do today to heal this broken world. > Episode five: A key to unlock the next level of human consciousness.
  • An invitation to try a recipe which is an experiment for healing the world.
  • How to start a lab page
  • Lab page attractor.

School of the Possible purpose.

Our goal is to give everyone on the planet the choice to participate in building the platform that will support and enable their future instead of sitting on the sidelines. To create the future we want instead of just drifting along and seeing what happens.
